Package learning.unsupervised.evaluation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicClusteringEvaluator
    This class can be used for initial algorithm testing - for more detailed testing and between-algorithm comparisons, BatchClusteringTester should be used exclusively, since it implements more options, more functionality, etc.
    BatchClusteringTester
    This class implements the functionality for cross-algorithm clustering comparisons on multiple datasets with multiple metrics, under possible inclusion of feature noiseRate or on the exact feature vectors.
    ClustererParametrization
    This class lists and sets the parameter values for clustering algorithms.
    LMethod
    L method is described in "Determining the number of clusters/segments in hierarchical clustering/segmentation algorithms" by Salvador, Chan 2004.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BatchClusteringTester.Normalization  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EmptyClusterException
    An exception that occurs when an empty cluster is encountered.
